main event: An object was observed in Kalamazoo, Michigan on May 12, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 2020 PM and lasted for about 5 minutes,The object was seen moving from 2 to 30 degrees elevation in the ESE, then disappearing suddenly without a change in speed,The color of the object resembled a light,There was only one witness reporting the sighting,The case was considered unreliable by the investigators.
witness description: one witness with no sound heard during the observation
